Rates

Residential, Commercial, Intrusion, Fire Alarm and Existing System Activation or Take-over. We offer a variation of monitoring rates to suit your needs. We will find what works for you please call us for details.

  • Basic landline monitoring: $24.95
  • Cellular Monitoring (primary or backup): $39.95
  • Enhanced Cellular Services: $44.95+
  • Remote arm/disarm, remote video, home automation†: $54.95+
  • † Requires Additional Equipment
